complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: 프로젝트 초기 설정 및 개발 환경 구축
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the project setup task into subtasks for environment setup, project configuration, and deployment preparation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has clear steps with standard technologies. The complexity is moderate due to multiple configuration steps, but these are well-documented processes with predictable outcomes.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Supabase 설정 및 데이터베이스 스키마 설계
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Supabase setup task into subtasks for account setup, schema design, security configuration, and integration testing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database schema design requires careful planning with multiple tables and relationships. The complexity is increased by security policies (RLS) implementation and proper foreign key constraints.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the layout and common components task into subtasks for layout structure, reusable UI components, and theming/styling implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating multiple reusable components with responsive design and accessibility considerations. The complexity comes from ensuring consistency across components and implementing dark mode support.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the main page development into subtasks for hero section implementation, content sections development, and SEO optimization
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The main page requires integration of multiple components, image optimization, and SEO considerations. The complexity is moderate with performance optimization requirements for image loading.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the accommodation page task into subtasks for listing page, detail page, filtering system, and real-time availability display
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves both list and detail views with data fetching from Supabase, filtering functionality, and dynamic content. The complexity increases with real-time availability checking and image gallery implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the camping site page development into subtasks for site map implementation, information display, pricing section, and responsive design
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The camping page requires implementation of an interactive map (SVG or react-leaflet) which adds complexity. Multiple information sections and responsive design considerations increase the development effort.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the amenities page task into subtasks for data fetching implementation, gallery development, and facility description sections
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is similar to other content pages but includes image gallery with lightbox functionality. The complexity is moderate with standard data fetching and display requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the review system into subtasks for review display, submission form, image upload functionality, admin response system, and filtering/sorting features
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The review system involves complete CRUD operations, file uploads to Supabase Storage, rating implementation, and admin interaction features. The complexity is higher due to these interactive elements and state management requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the reservation system into subtasks for calendar implementation, availability checking, booking form, payment integration, confirmation system, and cancellation/modification features
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is one of the most complex tasks with real-time availability checking, date selection, payment processing integration, and notification systems. The complexity is high due to the critical business logic and multiple external integrations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the admin panel development into subtasks for authentication system, reservation management, content management, review moderation, and analytics dashboard
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The admin panel requires secure authentication, multiple management interfaces, and a statistics dashboard with charts. The complexity is high due to the breadth of functionality and security considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the customer support feature into subtasks for FAQ system, contact form implementation, chat integration, and support request management
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task includes both static content (FAQ) and interactive elements (contact form, chat). The optional real-time chat integration adds complexity, especially if implementing a custom solution rather than a third-party service.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the performance and SEO task into subtasks for image optimization, code optimization, SEO implementation, and performance monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires technical expertise across multiple areas including image optimization, code splitting, caching strategies, and SEO best practices. The complexity comes from the breadth of optimizations and the need to measure improvements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the security enhancement task into subtasks for data encryption, authentication security, API protection, security headers implementation, and security testing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security implementation requires specialized knowledge across multiple domains including encryption, authentication, and protection against various attack vectors. The complexity is high due to the critical nature of security features and the need for thorough testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the internationalization task into subtasks for i18n setup, translation file creation, component adaptation, and localization testing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing internationalization requires systematic changes throughout the application, including translation file management and component modifications. The complexity increases with the number of supported languages and localization requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the analytics and monitoring task into subtasks for analytics implementation, error tracking setup, performance monitoring, and reporting dashboard creation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves integration with multiple third-party services for analytics, error tracking, and performance monitoring. The complexity comes from configuring these services correctly and ensuring proper data collection and visualization.
